Style.Active: QPushButton{background-color: THEME.COLOR_BACKGROUND_2; font-weight: bold; border-top: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3; border-left: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3;border-bottom: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3;}
Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent;border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_BACKGROUND_1; font-weight: bold; border-top: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2; border-left: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2;border-bottom: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2;}

Style.Active: QPushButton{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_1; font-weight: bold; border-top: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3; border-left: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3;border-bottom: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_3;}
Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-top: 6px solid transparent; border-left: 6px solid transparent;border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4; font-weight: bold; border-top: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2; border-left: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2;border-bottom: 5px solid $COLOR_BACKGROUND_2;}

Style.Active: QPushButton{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_1; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}
Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}

Style.Active: QPushButton{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_1; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}
Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}

Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}

Style.NotActive: QPushButton{background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border-radius: 10px} QPushButton::hover{background-color: THEME.COLOR_ACCENT_4}
